# Todo App

A simple todo app with CRUD operations.

## Usage

1. Clone the repository:
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/todo-app.git
   cd todo-app
   ```
2. Run the tests:
   ```bash
   npm test
   ```

notes: Added package.json, README.md, index.js, and data.json to set up the project structure and ensure the server can run.
